text: Nde maaŋ muuŋgiap, nde kha nuianan tɨvi, nde won ndavi vherir za nta shogirim, nta rimgiri. Gu kha khesharigi tɨvi ga nzuai, nde ruarir gumgi gu mbigi wari ndi tɨv, nde ana thari, nde tɨvi mbatɨgi thari, nde ndavi khavav tɨvi mbatɨgi ga mbui tɨvi thari. Nde harigi gumgi bigi garav, nta niihi tɨvi thari. Harigi gumgi bigi garav nta niihi tɨv, ana mbarɨvi gu tori rotu mbui fara muuŋgi.
